definition: awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan

sentences.english: Strawberry, blackcurrant, litchi and mango are some popular flavoured yoghurt.
sentences.chinese: 草莓，黑醋栗，荔枝和芒果是一些受歡迎風味的酸奶。

sentences.english: My favorite fruits are mango and pineapple .
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡的水果是芒果和鳳梨。

sentences.english: Mango is well-known as the king among the tropical fruits. It is abundant along the Youjiang River Valley of Baise.
sentences.chinese: 芒果稱爲“熱帶果王”，百色右江河谷芒果資源豐富。

sentences.english: Mango is well-known as the king among the tropical fruits. It is abundant along the Youjiang River Valley of Baise.
sentences.chinese: 芒果稱爲“熱帶果王”，百色右江河谷芒果資源豐富。

sentences.english: Looked at a bag of dried mango, I suddenly felt a kind of swindling.
sentences.chinese: 看着那一袋芒果乾，我突然間有種欺騙上當的感覺。

sentences.english: Bananas are scarce, not to mention mangos.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉已下市了，更不用說芒果了。

sentences.english: She recently falls in love for Orange juice and Mango Juice….
sentences.chinese: 最近她愛上了兩種果汁，橙汁和芒果汁。

sentences.english: Esperanza moves into a new home on Mango Street.
sentences.chinese: 埃斯佩朗莎搬到了芒果街上的一個新家。

sentences.english: ConclusionMangiferin sulfonate sodium has good antilelkemia effect in vitro and vivo.
sentences.chinese: 結論芒果苷磺酸鈉有較好的體內外抗白血病作用。

sentences.english: Mangos are not in season now.
Sorry, we only have canned mango juice.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我們只有罐裝的芒果汁。

sentences.english: Mango weevils is a main pest attacking mango in the tropical region.
sentences.chinese: 芒果象甲是危害芒果的重要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: Mango weevils is a main pest attacking mango in the tropical region.
sentences.chinese: 芒果象甲是危害芒果的重要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: I visited their carefully nurtured gardens of bananas , mangos and papayas.
sentences.chinese: 我參觀了他們精心培育的香蕉園，芒果園和番木瓜園。

sentences.english: The crane stood grave and still in the swamp near the mango grove.
sentences.chinese: 白鶴莊嚴而安靜地立在芒果樹旁的泥沼中。

sentences.english: Haden is in the pedigree of most of the Florida mango cultivars.
sentences.chinese: Haden在佛羅里達州大多數芒果血統中都存在。

definition: litchi or lychee fruit (Litchi chinensis Sonn.)
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
